title: Old Time Religion
author: Charles D. Tillman
lyric: And it’s good enough for me.
It was good for our mothers.
It was good for our mothers.
It was good for our mothers.
And it’s good enough for me.
And it’s good enough for me.
And it’s good enough for me.
And it’s good enough for me.
And it’s good enough for me.
And it’s good enough for me.
It will do when I am dying.
It will do when I am dying.
It will do when I am dying.
And it’s good enough for me.
And it’s good enough for me.
It will take us all to heaven.
It will take us all to heaven.
It will take us all to heaven.
And it’s good enough for me.
And it’s good enough for me.
